item.content:encoded: Image: Valve Valve‚Äôs 64GB and 512GB handhelds are 15% off through July 11 Valve is kicking off its Steam Summer Sale with an awesome discount on the Steam Deck. Right now, you can pick up either the 64 GB or 512 GB model of the original LCD Steam Deck for their lowest price yet. The 64 GB model is on sale for $296.65 (was $349), while the 512 GB version is just $381.65 (was $449). Valve is slowly phasing out its launch models of the Steam Deck equipped with LCD screens, so this deal will only ...

item.title: Elden Ring‚Äôs DLC isn‚Äôt as difficult if you just run away | Polygon - Gaming
item.description: Image: Bandai Namco Real winners quit (and go exploring) Is Shadow of the Erdtree too hard? I thought it might be when I first started. The Blackgaol Knight kicked my ass immediately, and I couldn‚Äôt...
item.content:encoded: Image: Bandai Namco Real winners quit (and go exploring) Is Shadow of the Erdtree too hard? I thought it might be when I first started. The Blackgaol Knight kicked my ass immediately, and I couldn‚Äôt even go walking in the forest without a beastman ripping me to shreds. Then I remembered the strategy that got me through so much of the Lands Between: just run away. You‚Äôre not imagining things. Shadow of the Erdtree‚Äôs difficulty is a step above Elden Ring, with enemies strong enough to make your ...

item.content:encoded: Image: Blizzard The season‚Äôs best stuff is in World Tier 3 only Blizzard has given a fairly comprehensive picture of what to expect from Diablo 4‚Äôs fifth season in advance of a weeklong test on the game‚Äôs Public Test Realm (PTR). The as-yet-untitled season 5, which begins on Aug. 6, will offer a new quest line that sounds as if it will lead into Vessel of Hatred, Diablo 4‚Äôs first full expansion, which launches on Oct. 8. item.description: Image: Epic Games It‚Äôs called ‚ÄòReload‚Äô It‚Äôs time to return to Tilted Towers. Fortnite is getting a surprise update this weekend. It‚Äôs called ‚ÄúReload‚Äù and it‚Äôll launch on Saturday, the official Fortni...
item.content:encoded: Image: Epic Games It‚Äôs called ‚ÄòReload‚Äô It‚Äôs time to return to Tilted Towers. Fortnite is getting a surprise update this weekend. It‚Äôs called ‚ÄúReload‚Äù and it‚Äôll launch on Saturday, the official Fortnite account said on X. A teaser trailer revealed it this update will introduce a new map and mode to Fortnite. You can view the full teaser on the official Fortnite X account. Longer-time players might recognize the map has classic locations from previous versions of the game like Tilted Towers, Reta...

item.content:encoded: Image: aaladin66, Pony, Sky, AestheticSpartan Don‚Äôt think, just click What‚Äôs a banana worth? A diamond banana may be worth $70 or $165, depending on the day. The gentleman banana ‚Äî a banana with a hat and dress shoes ‚Äî is less than a dollar. The pickle banana, which is a banana-shaped pickle, is roughly $40. There‚Äôs even a banana, the golden, shiny banana, that sold for more than $1,000. But most bananas, regardless of their looks, are worth just pennies ‚Äî even the banana made of dark matter. ...
